sources.title: Gone to Maui | FULL MOVIE | Action, Comedy | Pat Morita
sources.description:
After his three month holiday as a windsurfing instructor in Hawaii expires, Mickey must decide whether he wants to return to the family banking business in Boston or remain in the carefree, eccentric life he has built for himself in Maui.

The Karate Kid’s Pat Morita stars in this  profoundly… raunchy sex comedy?

Marianne Filali, Paul Germaine-Brown, Lars Kamper, Roland Kickinger, Cesar Lopapa, Pat Morita, Matthew Quinet

Directed by Robert C. Thompson
1999

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: James "Kimo " as Kimo plays a game of whits against local menehune, time share agents and the devil, all with a local twist. Chris rose as Mcoy plays a game of Russian roulette against his own helicopter and a whimsical leprechaun on a gold rush fueled killing spree. Catch all the action Tuesday at three's bar and grill
metadata.Actors: Pat Morita, Cesar Lopapa, Lars von Saldern
